Marguerite Obolensky
      
      
      Home
      Research
      ☰
      
      
      
        
          Marguerite  Obolensky
          
            
                
                  
                    Email
                  
                
              
                          
        

        
          
      
      
        
          
          Bio
          I am a PhD candidate in Sustainable Development at Columbia University in the City of New York.
          I am a PhD student in Sustainable Development at Columbia University. I am interested in applying the tools from empirical industrial organization to questions on agriculture and political economy.
          My current research is…
          I hold a Master in Environmental Economics and Climate Change from the London School of Economics and a Master in Environmental Science from Ecole Polytechnique, France. Prior to my PhD, I worked as a consultant in disaster risk management at the World Bank.
